'''Carlo Fortuni''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A trim man in practical, well-crafted leathers watches you from the corner of his eyes. When he catches you looking his way, his hand drifts casually to the dagger at his hip and lingers for a moment.
Then he smiles, the corners of his hazel eyes crinkling with genuine warmth, and waves you over.

Carlo was born to a family of merchants on the Pearl Coast, growing up learning his father's trade and geography. His good fortune continued, until he made the mistake of joining up with a company from Girrara that traded in beautiful weavings. Trouble is, the goods were produced by a kidnapped weaver named Bonisetta. When the [Watcher](/watcher/)'s companion uncovered that crime, Carlo was caught up in the fallout and exiled from the Republics. 

He fled to the Deadfire, seeking anonymity and whatever opportunities he can find.
